name: NO HOMEBREW
description: Disables everything not from Paizo. Homebrew content is colored green in this menu.

content.name: Flagellant
content.description: More casting-oriented cleric who powers up their spells with their own blood.

content.name: Warsighted
content.description: An oracle who trades revelations for combat feats.

content.name: Blood Arcanist
content.description: An arcanist with fewer exploits but a full bloodline.

content.name: Pact Wizard
content.description: Wizard who trades bonus feats for a witch patron and eventually an oracle curse.

content.name: Alchemical Affinity
content.description: Higher CL when casting spells that are both in wizard and alchemist lists.

content.name: Forest Blessing
content.description: Higher CL when casting spells that are both in wizard and druid lists.

content.name: Idealize
content.description: Transmutation spells like Bull's Strength grant a higher bonus.

content.name: Knowledge Is Power
content.description: Adds Intelligence modifier to CMB and CMD.

content.name: Opposition Research
content.description: Cancels the disadvantages of opposition schools.

content.name: Staff-like Wand
content.description: Use the wizard's caster level and DC modifiers when using wands.

content.name: Metamagic Insight
content.description: Use a known metamagic feat for free twice per day.

content.name: Shrewd Tactician
content.description: Denies enemies' flanking bonus to AB.

content.name: Acadamae Graduate
content.description: Summoning spells only take a standard action to cast but have a chance to cause fatigue for a while.

content.name: Intensified Spell
content.description: Metamagic that raises maximum number of damage dices by 5.

content.name: Dazing Spell
content.description: Metamagic that rmakes your damaging spells daze their targets.

content.name: Circle Of Order
content.description: Very short-lived but large dodge bonus against attacks made by chaotic enemies.

content.name: Warrior Priest Mythic
content.description: Initiative and concentration bonus for divine casters.

content.name: Mythic Poison
content.description: Ignore poison immunity of living creatures.
